channel.title: Project Plexity ~ 474 GameFrame
channel.description:
[size=36pt][left]Project Plexity[/left][/size]
Project Plexity is a new PI in developement, Probably thinking "Another pi :(" Well i was thinking about quiting the developement of project plexity because of all the PI's out there but then i reliased why should i quit when i may have a chance to make a good server here!
My main goal for this server is to achieve an alright player base, I don't want to become the #1 striving server, Aslong as i get dedicated members/staff i'll be willing to keep this server up and running.
Some photos: http://imgur.com/7hY5RRx
Thats the only picture i got at the moment because i started the developement late last night and i was only changing the name of everything and redoing the quest tab, Making it cleaner.
I'm currently working on refixing on a new skilling area/training area/home area/donator island... Easy shit lol. Hopefully you'll like watching this project go further! Please tell me what you think about it!
I started development late last night, And i redid the whole quest tab and made it look 10x cleaner then the original one, I redid the mage book quest, I added a christmas tree, And this morning i added a custom welcome screen in, and i'm working on adding a little tutorial island where you speak to a npc and he'll help you and stuff and i worked on adding a few interfaces.

item.title: Project Plexity ~ 474 GameFrame
item.dc:creator: @Monthly1 Monthly-
item.description:
@Monthly1 wrote:

[size=36pt][left]Project Plexity[/left][/size]

Project Plexity is a new PI in developement, Probably thinking “Another pi :(” Well i was thinking about quiting the developement of project plexity because of all the PI’s out there but then i reliased why should i quit when i may have a chance to make a good server here!

My main goal for this server is to achieve an alright player base, I don’t want to become the #1 striving server, Aslong as i get dedicated members/staff i’ll be willing to keep this server up and running.

Some photos:
http://imgur.com/7hY5RRx

Thats the only picture i got at the moment because i started the developement late last night and i was only changing the name of everything and redoing the quest tab, Making it cleaner.

I’m currently working on refixing on a new skilling area/training area/home area/donator island… Easy shit lol.
Hopefully you’ll like watching this project go further! Please tell me what you think about it!

I started development late last night, And i redid the whole quest tab and made it look 10x cleaner then the original one, I redid the mage book quest, I added a christmas tree, And this morning i added a custom welcome screen in, and i’m working on adding a little tutorial island where you speak to a npc and he’ll help you and stuff and i worked on adding a few interfaces.
